title: Ticket #645: Unable to use tools with all daemons
description:
The condor_restart/condor_reconfig tools are unable to handle all the condor daemons with the -subsystem option:

$ condor_restart -subsystem job_router Can't connect to unknown daemon

$ condor_reconfig -subsystem job_router Can't connect to unknown daemon

condor_on and condor_off works correctly with -subsystem job_router
attachments:
• generic_ads_querying.patch 14162 bytes added by rrati on 2009-Aug-03 15:28:42 UTC.
    This patch will allow querying of daemons that are registered with the generic adtype. If new daemons are registered as generic adtypes, then the condor tools should now be able to query them.
